`urf2lldp` was made as a fun side project and presented at CANE. The purpose is to fit rating factors, particularly ILFs and Deductible factors, using limited average severity f.

# Libraries

The following libraries are used.

```{r eval= FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(actuar)
```
